text.custom: How did this stupid artifact get me here? Why wonâ€™t it take me back home!
Sights are on the intruder! Dolphins converge!
Ahhh! Maybe this thing can help me get away from whatever a dolphin is.
So I can create a portal by Left Clicking and dragging, and at any point I can hold Tab to view my world. If I really mess up I can hit R to redo things.
